about_the_game:
This is a minimalist style roguelite strategy game that uses a fast-paced warchess system. Players can collect ships, upgrade flagships, and personally command every detail of the battle in detail.

Expand your fleet

In the interface between galaxies and the star systems, players can encounter various events and battles to obtain trophies such as ships and equipment, thus growing their fleet.

Collecting Ships

This game contains three different factions, each with dozens of unique regular ships. Collect them on your journey and make them your powerful allies!

Strengthening the flagship

Each faction in this game includes several distinctive flagships, and you can collect equipment during your journey and install it on the flagship to gain powerful combat power.

Unique Battle Board System

1. Movement in this game's combat is divided into four types: forward, lateral, backward, and rotation. Master each ship's movement pattern and freely change your formation at the right time!

2. Large ships usually have several weapons, and you can select a target for each weapon individually, or you can press the "fire all weapon" button to pour all firepower onto one target.

3. Your weapons can be roughly divided into three types: energy, kinetic, and missiles. Each type has its own unique mechanism, and using them properly can bring out their full potential!

  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050

short_description: This is a roguelike game which is minimalist (crossed it out) which has no money for art. The player needs to play as a fleet commander, commanding the fleet to travel to a galaxy bathed in war, purifying the dangerous enemies entrenched in it, and saving your people from fire and water.
